mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_SHARE, VIEWS, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS WRITE_DATE, WRITER FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_SHARE = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO ( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_SHARE, BOARD_TYPE, WRITER, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{share}, #{boardType}, #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_INFO SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
